title: Lego kids intro to Technology
content: I am 4 years old and my dad got me a lego set for me to build with him and I am learning a lot from it. All while having fun.

title: Making Youtube videos
content: I utilize technology to make youtube videos. I enjoy fitness and technology allows me to make videos on that topic.

title: Tech for coding
content: Technology I use for my coding is a mac laptop, secondary screen, and different software to allow me to do my coding efficiently.
